rules.name: BANG_OPRAH
rules.description: Talks about Oprah with an exclamation!

rules.name: BODY_ENHANCEMENT2
rules.description: Information on getting larger body parts

rules.name: DEAR_WINNER
rules.description: Spam with generic salutation of "dear winner"

rules.name: DRUGS_SMEAR1
rules.description: Two or more drugs crammed together into one word

rules.name: DRUG_ED_SILD
rules.description: Talks about an E.D. drug using its chemical name

rules.name: EM_ROLEX
rules.description: Message puts emphasis on the watch manufacturer

rules.name: EXCUSE_24
rules.regex: you(?:'ve|'re| have| are)? receiv(?:e|ed|ing) this (?:advertisement|offer|special|recurring|paid).{0,16}\b(?:by either|because)

rules.name: EXCUSE_4
rules.description: Claims you can be removed from the list

rules.name: EXCUSE_REMOVE
rules.description: Talks about how to be removed from mailings

rules.name: GTUBE
rules.description: Generic Test for Unsolicited Bulk Email

rules.name: LOOPHOLE_1
rules.description: A loop hole in the banking laws?

rules.name: MARKETING_PARTNERS
rules.description: Claims you registered with a partner

rules.name: MORE_SEX
rules.description: Talks about a bigger drive for sex

rules.name: NA_DOLLARS
rules.description: Talks about a million North American dollars

rules.name: NOT_SPAM
rules.regex: \b(?:(?:this (?:e?-?mail|message)|we) (?:is not|are not|cannot be considered) Spam|ESTE CORREO NO PUEDE SER CONSIDERADO (?:INTRUSIVO|spam)|Diese Nachricht ist KEIN SPAM)
rules.description: I'm not spam! Really! I'm not, I'm not, I'm not!

rules.name: PRICES_ARE_AFFORDABLE
rules.description: Message says that prices aren't too expensive

rules.name: REMOVE_BEFORE_LINK
rules.description: Removal phrase right before a link

rules.name: REPLICA_WATCH
rules.description: Message talks about a replica watch

rules.name: SCC_CANSPAM_2
rules.regex: you may unsubscribe by clicking here or by writing to

rules.name: STOCK_ALERT
rules.description: Offers a alert about a stock

rules.name: STRONG_BUY
rules.description: Tells you about a strong buy

rules.name: TVD_ACT_193
rules.description: Message refers to an act passed in the 1930s

rules.name: TVD_APPROVED
rules.description: Body states that the recipient has been approved

rules.name: TVD_LINK_SAVE
rules.description: Spam with the text "link to save"

rules.name: TVD_PH_REC
rules.description: Message includes a phrase commonly used in phishing mails

rules.name: TVD_PH_SEC
rules.description: Message includes a phrase commonly used in phishing mails

rules.name: TVD_QUAL_MEDS
rules.description: The body matches phrases such as "quality meds" or "quality medication"

rules.name: UNCLAIMED_MONEY
rules.description: People just leave money laying around

rules.name: __ACCOUNT_SECURE
rules.regex: \b(?:make your (?:"?[^\@\s]+\@\S+"? |e-?mail )?account more secure|Ihre Kreditkarte weist einige Sicherheitsprobleme)\b

rules.name: __BOUNCE_NEVER_SEE
rules.regex: \bThis is an autoresponder. I'll never see your message\b

rules.name: __BOUNCE_NONWORKING
rules.regex: \bYou have reached a non.?working address.  Please check\b

rules.name: __BOUNCE_NO_RESEND
rules.regex: \bPlease do not resend your original message\.

rules.name: __BOUNCE_OOO_B1
rules.regex: \bI ?.m away until .{10,20} and am unable to read your message\b

rules.name: __BOUNCE_OOO_B2
rules.regex: \bI am currently out of the office\b

rules.name: __CLEAN_MAILBOX
rules.regex: \b(?:(?:e-?mail|mail\s?box|violation:|(?-i:CLICK)) (?:quota size|clean(?:-?up))|clean ?up click ?here|(?:please|automatically) reduce (?:your|the) e?-?mail ?box size|reduce (?:your |the )?(?:e?-?mail(?: ?box)? )?size automatically)\b

rules.name: __COPY_PASTE_DE
rules.regex: Kopieren Sie es und f(?:\xfc|\xc3\xbc)gen Sie es ein|Kopieren \& Einf(?:\xfc|\xc3\xbc)gen

rules.name: __DOS_CORRESPOND_EMAIL
rules.regex: correspond with me using my email

rules.name: __DOS_LET_GO_JOB
rules.regex: I was (?:let go|fired|layed off|dismissed) from a job I h(?:el|a)d for (?:2\d years|\d{3} months)

rules.name: __FRAUD_BEP
rules.regex: \b(?:bank of nigeria|central bank of|trust bank|apex bank|amalgamated bank)\b

rules.name: __FRAUD_IOV
rules.regex: \b(?:no risks?|risky?[- ]{0,3}free|free of risks?|100% safe|v\S{1,3}llig Risikofrei ist)\b

rules.name: __FRAUD_IRT
rules.regex: \b(?:compliments? of the|dear friend|dear sir|yours faithfully|season'?s greetings)\b

rules.name: __FRAUD_XJR
rules.regex: (?:who was a|as a|an? honest|you being a|to any) foreigner

rules.name: __HK_SCAM_S15
rules.regex: (?:discovered a dormant account|can you be my partner)

rules.name: __NEVER_HEAR_EN
rules.regex: (never hear me again|destroy all your secrets|not bother you again|leave you alone)

rules.name: __NEVER_HEAR_IT
rules.regex: eliminare tutti i tuoi segreti|Ti garantisco che non ti disturbe

rules.name: __PDS_SENT_TO_EMAIL_ADDR
rules.regex: This message was sent to Email Address\.

rules.name: __PUMPDUMP_09
rules.regex: \b(?:buy|get|snap up|grab) as many shares (?:of it )?as (?:you|I) can\b

rules.name: __RUDE_HTML_2
rules.regex: not support the display of HTML. Please view this message in a different

rules.name: __RUDE_HTML_3
rules.regex: This message contains an HTML formatted message but your email client does

rules.name: __RUDE_HTML_4
rules.regex: Your mailer do not support HTML messages. Switch to a better mailer

rules.name: __SYSADMIN
rules.regex: \b(?:help?[- ]?desk|(?:(?:web ?)?mail ?|sys(?:tem )?)admin(?:istrator)|local[- ]host|(?:support|upgrade|management|security|admin(?:istrat(?:or|ion))?) (?:team|center)|message from administrator|university mail server copyright|suporte t(?:=E9|[\xe9]|[\xc3][\xa9])cnico|administrador do sistema)\b

rules.name: __VBOUNCE_AVREPORT0
rules.regex: (antivirus system report|the antivirus module has|illegal attachment|Unrepairable Virus Detected)

rules.name: __VBOUNCE_DUTCH
rules.regex: bevatte bijlage besmet welke besmet was met een virus

rules.name: __VBOUNCE_GUIN
rules.regex: message contains file attachments that are not permitted

rules.name: __VBOUNCE_MAILMARSHAL
rules.regex: Mail.?Marshal Rule: Inbound Messages : Block Dangerous Attachments

rules.name: __VBOUNCE_MAILSWEEP
rules.regex: MAILsweeper has found that a \S+ \S+ \S+ \S+ one or more virus

rules.name: __VBOUNCE_STRIP_ATTACH
rules.regex: \bhas stripped one or more attachments from the following message\b

rules.name: __VBOUNCE_VALERT
rules.regex: The mail message \S+ \S+ you sent to \S+ contains the virus

rules.name: __WITHOUT_EFFORT
rules.regex: \bwith(?:out(?: a(?:ny)?| the)?| no)(?: great| special| extra)? effort\b
